title: Portfolio
description: This my portfolio website built with React, featuring a clean and responsive design. It highlights my projects, skills, and achievements as a full stack developer, demonstrating my proficiency in modern web technologies and user-friendly interfaces.

title: Chemia Galaxy
description: I developed this Android app for Teachers to send notes and take quizzes, managinng monthly fees.This was an Client project that have to part Teacher App and Student app ans this is the First one. This project demonstrates my mobile app development skills and focus on educational technology.

title: Chemia Students
description: I developed this Android app for Students notes, quizes, fees. This was the student part of the above mentioned app. This project also demonstrates my mobile app development skills and focus on educational technology.

title: College conference
description: I collaborated with my college team to develop an international conference website, providing event details, registration, and schedule. The site showcases my skills in teamwork and web development.

title: Noteman
description: I developed an advanced to-do app featuring daily tasks, important task prioritization, and task completion tracking, all integrated with login functionality with browser storages. It showcases my skills in front-end development also
